description:
Lucifer is now up against the Demon Lord of Sloth, Belphegor. Belphegor gathers her followers online, working with Mammon. Belial asks Belphegor to put an end to Lucifer once and for all. Lucifer ends up getting sucked into Belphegor`s game, along with Maria and Levi. With a battle for the virtual world ongoing, and tensions building between Maria and Lucifer, just what will happen?
Source: crunchyroll
